headline.main: Poll Shows 71 Percent of French Want Fillon to Quit Presidency Race
headline.print_headline: Poll Shows 71 Percent of French Want Fillon to Quit Presidency Race

lead_paragraph: Canada's Hydro One Ltd is in talks to buy municipal electricity distributor Toronto Hydro Corp for about C$3 billion (1.82 billion pounds) as the city of Toronto explores options to finance various infrastructure projects, people with knowledge of the matter told Reuters.
